name: edunite
description: 1. Navigate to the backend folder 2. Create a .env file right beside the index.js file 3. Create .env file with variable names EXACTLY like this ``` PORT = 9000 MONGO_URL='<YOUR MONGODB URL>' ``` 4. create 2 terminals, navigate one terminal inside backend folder and one in frontend folder 5. Run  ``` npm install ``` on BOTH the terminals
